abstract: An employee severance plan put in place by Yahoo to protect workers after a merger with Microsoft could skew the outcome of a proxy battle, a lawsuit says.
snippet: An employee severance plan put in place by Yahoo to protect workers after a merger with Microsoft could skew the outcome of a proxy battle, a lawsuit says.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  An employee severance plan put in place by Yahoo to protect workers after a merger with Microsoft should be rescinded immediately, according to a brief filed by plaintiffs in a shareholder lawsuit against Yahoo and its directors.

headline.main: Yahoo Shareholders Seek Repeal of Severance Plan
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Shareholders Seek Repeal of Severance Plan

abstract: Kaiser Permanente is endorsing the drive toward consumer-controlled personal health records in a partnership with Microsoft.
snippet: Kaiser Permanente is endorsing the drive toward consumer-controlled personal health records in a partnership with Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: Kaiser Permanente, the nation’s largest nonprofit health maintenance organization, is endorsing the drive toward consumer-controlled personal health records in a partnership with Microsoft.

headline.print_headline: Kaiser Endorses Microsoft’s Health Records Plan

abstract: An employee severance plan put in place by Yahoo to protect workers after a merger with Microsoft should be rescinded immediately, according to a brief filed by plaintiffs in a shareholder lawsuit against Yahoo and its directors.
lead_paragraph: An employee severance plan put in place by Yahoo to protect workers after a merger with Microsoft should be rescinded immediately, according to a brief filed by plaintiffs in a shareholder lawsuit against Yahoo and its directors.

headline.main: Yahoo Shareholders Seek Repeal of Severance Plan
